title: The Great Succession Crisis
description: Power play!The future of planet Beinan hangs in the balance. After the Great Council upholds the law limiting female inheritance, young Princess Anlei must navigate the dangerous adult world of gender politics to become the person she was born to be.Extended Edition features two bonus chapters, all five data files, plus a look behind the history and science that makes the Great Succession Crisis so special.
author: Laurel A. Rockefeller
